fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Time Snatch (Day, 2 use): Choose a target. If they have been afflicted by any ability that would cause them to die tonight, they will immediately be killed.
- Dark Dimension (Night, 2 use): All Unseen members may choose a role from the GIM thread to appear as to Investigative abilities tonight. If they do not choose a role, they will gain Detection Immunity instead.
- Deadly Resolve (Night, 1 use): All killing abilities will resolve before any other abilities tonight.
